column5: There is some Hogs Kicking Around 18lbs Caught Yesterday on Jig and Worm
Wow!!!  Do you think we'll be able to catch'em from shore in front of your place, Steve?  Or is that just a Spring thing?  I got some circle hooks just beggin for a big strip of salty sucker meat
you never know till you try ...i think the meat is a no go for this time of year ...worms are the ticket now ..
